categories: Category:Imperial Army officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Morastu was a male Human who served as a quartermaster in the Imperial Army of the Sith Empire. During the Battle of Corellia in the Galactic War, he was stationed at the Business Sector Tram Station in the Government District region of the planet Corellia, distributing stimulants and medical supplies to other Imperial forces.
Quartermaster Morastu appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as a Stims Vendor for Imperial players on Corellia.
